msContents.summary: Aeneas Silvius Piccolomini De Liberorum Educatione

supportDesc.p: paper. water-mark is a bird in a circle cf. Briquet, Vol.III, no.12202 (Rome 1479/80)

foliation.p: foliation on 1 - 53 in contemporary arabic numerals,

condition.p: Edges trimmed. Water and rust stains throughout.

physDesc.decoDesc: caps alternately red and blue; one border, Italian style, of inter twined vine stocks in blue, red, and green with a green parrot, on 1r.

bindingDesc.p: 19c. half Italian on boards covered with blue marbled paper; spine gilt-tooled title AENEA / SILVII / INSTIT
